abilities.name: Get Bashin'!
abilities.effect: Add 1 to shield bash rolls for friendly **Ardboyz** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Iron-fisted Commander
abilities.effect: If a friendly **Ardboyz** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

warscrolls.name: Ardboyz
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/10), Destruction, Ironjawz

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make a shield bash roll of D6 for each model in this unit that is within 3" of the target. For each 6+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Up We Go!
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have a Shouty Boss, pick a friendly **IRONJAWZ INFANTRY HERO** that is not in combat and is within 3" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now a Shouty Boss (see ‘Man da Tower!’).

abilities.name: I'm Off!
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss that was not placed on it this turn, set up the Shouty Boss on the battlefield wholly within 6" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Shouty Boss.

abilities.name: Aggressively Bossy
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss. On a 4+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply to the target until the start of your next turn:

***Dat’s Ours, Ya Git!:*** Subtract 3 from the target’s control score.

***Zog Off Wiv Ya Magic!:*** Subtract 1 from casting rolls and/or chanting rolls for the target.

***Oi! Hold It!:*** Subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

abilities.name: Man Da Tower!
abilities.effect:
While this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss:

• The Shouty Boss cannot use **MOVE** abilities.

• Instead of measuring range or visibility to and from the Shouty Boss, measure to and from this terrain feature instead.

• All attacks that would target the Shouty Boss target this terrain feature instead.

• If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Shouty Boss. Then, set up the Shouty Boss on the battlefield within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat.That unit is no longer the Shouty Boss. If it is not possible to set up the Shouty Boss, it is slain.

abilities.name: Berserkers
abilities.effect: This unit can use a **RUN** ability and still use **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

abilities.name: Unleashed Rage
abilities.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** if it charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: You Messin'?
abilities.effect: Enemy units with a Health characteristic of 1 or 2 cannot contest objectives while they are in combat with this unit.

warscrolls.name: Foot of Gork
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+) Destruction, Ironjawz, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Wandering Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a part of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 9" of the other part of this **MANIFESTATION**.

Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit within 3" of the target. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• That unit has the **STOMPED** keyword until the start of your next turn.
• Subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for **STOMPED** units, to a minimum of 1.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this **MANIFESTATION**’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this **MANIFESTATION** is destroyed and all its parts are removed from play.

warscrolls.name: Gordrakk, the Fist of Gork
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Fly, Destruction, Ironjawz, Maw-krusha

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Bigteef’s Fists and Tail** is 6.

abilities.name: Monster Grapple
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 of the target’s weapons. You must pick a **Companion** weapon if it has any. Halve the Attacks characteristic of that weapon (rounding up) for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Strength From Victory
abilities.effect:
If any damage points were allocated to an enemy unit by this unit’s combat attacks this turn and that enemy unit has been destroyed, give this unit a **Waaagh! token**, to a maximum of 3.

Until the end of the next turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s weapons for each **Waaagh! token** it has.

abilities.name: Voice of Gork
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared a WAAAGH! ability
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **IRONJAWZ** units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

abilities.name: Gore-grunta Charge
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Add 1 to the mortal damage inflicted (if any) if the target is **CAVALRY**.

warscrolls.name: Gork-Roara
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Destruction, Ironjawz, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Bellowing Waaagh!-Cries
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **IRONJAWZ** or **KRULEBOYZ WIZARD** or **PRIEST** within 3" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Pick either 1 or 2 to add to casting rolls or chanting rolls for the target until the start of your next turn. Then, roll a number of dice equal to the number picked. For each 1-2, allocate 1 damage point to the target (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points). For each 5+, until the start of your next turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **KRULEBOYZ** or **IRONJAWZ** units while they are wholly within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

Friendly units can be affected by this ability multiple times and the effects are cumulative.

abilities.name: Dead 'Ard
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target this unit.

warscrolls.name: Kragnos, the End of Empires
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Destruction, Ironjawz, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **The** **Dread Mace** is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per **SPELL** ability.

abilities.name: Avatar of Destruction
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: The End of Empires
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly **DESTRUCTION** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 × 6).

abilities.name: Flattened Into The Mud
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice and add the number of **momentum points** this unit has to the roll. On a 5+, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Momentum
abilities.effect:
Each time this unit has charged as a result of using a **CHARGE** ability, it gains **1 momentum point**.

Each time it uses a **RUN** ability, it gains **2 momentum points**. It can have a maximum of **3 momentum points** at once.

Add the number of **momentum points** this unit has to the Damage characteristic of its **Maw-grunta’s Tusks**. At the end of each battle round, subtract 1 from its **momentum points**, to a minimum of 0.

abilities.name: Carve a Path
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.effect:
If this unit is in combat, it can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through models and the combat ranges of enemy units, but it cannot end that move in combat.

Then, pick each enemy unit that this unit passed across during that move to be the targets. Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, this unit gains 2 **momentum points**.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Momentum
abilities.effect:
Each time this unit has charged as a result of using a **CHARGE** ability, it gains **1 momentum point**.

Each time it uses a **RUN** ability, it gains **2 momentum points**. It can have a maximum of **3 momentum points** at once.

Add the number of **momentum points** this unit has to the Damage characteristic of its **Maw-grunta’s Tusks**. At the end of each battle round, subtract 1 from its **momentum points**, to a minimum of 0.

abilities.name: Strength From Victory
abilities.effect:
If any damage points were allocated to an enemy unit by this unit’s combat attacks this turn and that enemy unit has been destroyed, give this unit a **Waaagh! token**, to a maximum of 3.

Until the end of the next turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s weapons for each **Waaagh! token** it has.

abilities.name: Lead Da Brutes
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **BRUTE** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Megaboss on Maw-Krusha
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Destruction, Ironjawz, Maw-krusha

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Maw-krusha’s Fists and Tail** is 5.

abilities.name: Strength From Victory
abilities.effect:
If any damage points were allocated to an enemy unit by this unit’s combat attacks this turn and that enemy unit has been destroyed, give this unit a **Waaagh! token**, to a maximum of 3.

Until the end of the next turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s weapons for each **Waaagh! token** it has.

abilities.name: Destructive Bulk
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a D3. On a 2+, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can end that move in combat. Then, pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across during that move. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the D3 roll. If that enemy unit is **INFANTRY**, double the mortal damage inflicted.

warscrolls.name: Morgok's Krushas
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Destruction, Ironjawz, Brute

abilities.name: In Their Element
abilities.effect: The first time an enemy **MONSTER** is destroyed by this unit, add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s attacks for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.name: Morkspit Marsh
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Destruction, Ironjawz, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Tricksy Footing
abilities.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 6" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Grasping Gunge
abilities.effect: Enemy units cannot use **RUN** abilities while they are within 6" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

abilities.name: Barge Through
abilities.effect: When this unit moves, it can pass through models in enemy **INFANTRY** units and can pass through the combat ranges of enemy **INFANTRY** units, but it cannot end the move in combat unless specified in the ability used.

abilities.name: Propa Wonky
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat, pick a friendly **IRONJAWZ** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Maw-grunta’s Tusks** is 3.

abilities.name: Head of the Stampede
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick up to 3 friendly **MAW‑GRUNTA** units wholly within 12" of this unit that charged this turn to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 momentum point to each target.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Momentum
abilities.effect:
Each time this unit has charged as a result of using a **CHARGE** ability, it gains 1 **momentum point**.

Each time it uses a **RUN** ability, it gains 2 **momentum points.** It can have a maximum of 3 **momentum points** at once.

Add the number of **momentum points** this unit has to the Damage characteristic of its **Maw-grunta’s Tusks.** At the end of each battle round, subtract 1 from its **momentum points**, to a minimum of 0.

abilities.name: Rhythm of Destruction
abilities.effect: If any enemy models were slain this turn by this unit’s combat attacks, give this unit D3 ritual points.

abilities.name: Berserkers
abilities.effect: This unit can use a **RUN** ability and still use **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

abilities.name: Brutal Power
abilities.effect: Add 1 to this unit’s power level while there are any friendly **IRONJAWZ** units that have 10 or more models wholly within 12" of it.

abilities.name: Power of Da Great Green God
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **IRONJAWZ INFANTRY** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make a forgin’ roll of D6. Add 1 to the roll if this unit is armed with **Grunta-tongs**. On a 4+, the target’s melee weapons have **Crit (Mortal)** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Klonk
abilities.effect:
**Klonk** is a token. You can re-roll forgin’ rolls for this unit while this unit’s **Klonk** is on the battlefield. 

If you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for this unit, remove this unit’s **Klonk** from the battlefield after the **ATTACK** ability has been resolved (the damage point is still inflicted).

abilities.name: Ward-smashing Choppa
abilities.effect: If an attack made with this unit’s **Ward-smashing Choppa** scores a hit, the target has the **WARD‑SMASHED** keyword for the rest of the battle. Ward rolls cannot be made for a **WARD-SMASHED** unit even if this unit has been destroyed.

rules.name: Natural Disaster
rules.effect: If you make an unmodified charge roll of 8+ for a friendly non-**HERO IRONJAWZ** unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

rules.name: Spirit of Gork
rules.effect: Friendly **IRONJAWZ INFANTRY** units have **WARD (6+)** while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly **IRONJAWZ WIZARDS** or **PRIESTS**.

rules.name: Smashin' and Bashin'
rules.effect: The first time each turn that an enemy unit is destroyed by a **FIGHT** ability used by a friendly **IRONJAWZ** unit, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by the next friendly **IRONJAWZ** unit that is picked to use a **FIGHT** ability for the rest of the turn.

rules.name: Duff Up Da Big Thing
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **IRONJAWZ** unit to be the target.
rules.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks that target an enemy unit that has a Health characteristic greater than its own.

rules.name: Mightiest Destroyers
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Any Hero Phase
rules.effect:
If there are any friendly **Megabosses** on the battlefield, for the rest of the turn, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target when using the ‘Mighty Destroyers’ ability.

If there are no friendly **Megabosses** on the battlefield, roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target when using the ‘Mighty Destroyers’ ability.

rules.name: 'Ere We Come!
rules.effect: Add the number of enemy units that have been destroyed this battle to the Move characteristic of friendly **Gore-gruntas** and **MAW-GRUNTA** units, to a maximum of +4.

spells.name: Fixin' Beat
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **IRONJAWZ PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **IRONJAWZ** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: **Heal (D6)** the target. If the chanting roll was 8+, **Heal (D3+3)** the target instead.

spells.name: Get 'Em Beat
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **IRONJAWZ PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **IRONJAWZ** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to charge rolls for the target. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

spells.name: Killa Beat
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **IRONJAWZ PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **IRONJAWZ** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 10+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

spells.name: Da Great Big Green Hand of Gork
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **IRONJAWZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 12" of them and not in combat to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 24" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Mighty 'Eadbutt
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **IRONJAWZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. If the target is a **WIZARD**, inflict 3 mortal damage on the target instead.

spells.name: Bash 'Em Ladz!
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **IRONJAWZ WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **IRONJAWZ** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: The target’s melee weapons have **Crit (2 Hits)** for the rest of the turn.
